text.p: Nexus Telecommunication Systems Ltd said on Monday it had closed a previously announced private placement with Global Wireless Communications LP of New York.

Global Wireless has purchased for $1 million warrants exercisable into 666,667 ordinary shares at a price of $5.35 a share. The initial $1.50 warrant purchase price will be credited towards the exercise price.

Global Wireless has also been granted an option, to be exercised no later than November 20, to purchase up to 2,333,333 warrants for $3.5 million. The exercise price will be 35 percent above the average market price of Nexus' shares during the 30 trading days prior to the date the option is exercised. The exercise price will not exceed $8.00. The warrants expire August 7, 2002.
Global Wireless will initiate commercial ventures for the distribution of Nexus products in a number of emerging markets and will invest up to $5 million in such ventures.
Nexus makes low energy wireless communications and location systems.
